translation.services_title2: Find here all our services and online transactions.
translation.info_login: Enter with your data to the employee area, here you can perform more actions and know the movements of users.
translation.consult_bill_text: To check your statement, download or pay your invoice ...
translation.information_text: Information about our products, services, prices, etc.
translation.pqrs_petition_text: It is the fundamental right of every person to submit respectful requests to the authorities for reasons of general or particular interest, and to obtain their prompt resolution.
translation.pqrs_complain_text: It is the manifestation of protest, censorship, dissatisfaction, disagreement or dissatisfaction that a person formulates because of the breach of a current legal norm.
translation.pqrs_claim_text: It is the right that every person has to demand, claim or sue a satisfactory solution or attention, whether for a general or particular reason, regarding the improper provision of a service or the lack of attention to a request.
translation.pqrs_suggestion_text: It is the expression of ideas or proposals that can help to improve a service or the management of the same entity.
translation.pqrs_send_request: To send your request, fill in the following fields
